participant_1.background:
My favorite musicians are the ones that help me feel empowered and confident.
I went to a farm and met a lot of baby animals on my last vacation.

My family is not very wealthy, but we do what we can to help those in need.

i have epilepsy.
I can't seem to avoid tripping over my own feet.

content.text: hello, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I'm doing well too, thanks for asking! I just got back from a vacation to a farm where I met a lot of baby animals.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love animals, but I don't get to go to farms very often.
Yeah, it was really great. I got to hold a baby goat and a baby pig.
That's amazing! I've always wanted to hold a baby goat.
I think it's something everyone should experience at least once in their life.
Agreed! I'm sure it would be very cute.
It was! I also got to feed some of the animals, which was really cool.
That sounds like a great time. I'm glad you enjoyed your vacation.
Thanks! I'm glad I got to share it with you.
You're welcome! I'm always happy to hear about people's vacations
